description: Single storey rear extension and installation of canopy; installation of door to side extension and raised platform with canopy; alteration to external elevations; installation of bicycle storage
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Application Form, Site Location Plan, 110LR-A-S-PL-PLA2-PR-GAD-L00 Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-PL-PLA2-PR-GAD-L01 Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-PL-PLA2-PR-GAD-L02 Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-PL-PLA2-PR-GAD-LR Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-SE-PLA2-GAD-AA Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-SE-PLA2-GAD-BB Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-SE-PLA2-GAD-CC Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-EL-PLA2-GAD-WEST Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-EL-PLA2-GAD-EAST Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-EL-PLA2-GAD-NORTH Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-EL-PLA2-GAD-SOUTH Rev 01, 110LR-A-S-DOC-MATERIALITY Rev 01, received 24.12.2021
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site, aside from those approved within the plans of condition 2 above.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D5 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
